title: Crptomagma
author: Crptomagma
content: The big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies. In our world of today where Blockchain technology has created financial freedom lots of digital currencies enthusiasts,  believe Bitcoin investments have the striving potential to produce modern age digital currency millionaires and possibly billionaires. I'm not here to talk about Bitcoin volatility, even life itself is volatile but it's worth holding on so Bitcoin also is worth holding on. Why did I say this;  many atimes I hear people using Bitcoin volatility nature to excuse themselves for not investing.Bitcoin has attracted even world great men and made them believe in blockchain technology. It's not an underlying factor that Bitcoin is a great accumulation of worth. I persive Bitcoin as the emperor, the conquerer and game changer for any jack striving to survive in digital currencies. It's influence cannot be overemphasize, Bitcoin have a multilateral influence in a large number of multi national industries, and could transform a number of sectors globally ranging from agricultural sectors, medicals, logistics sectors are also beneficiaries of Bitcoins, it supply energies to even the  centralized systems. I'm originally from a society where, enthusiasts are optimistic that Bitcoin existence is part of a daily activities. Bitcoin influence makes it a fascinating investment to enthusiasts and also gives promising future for other altcoins. Bitcoin is endowed with tight security technology and has long term store of value. However this is my candid strategical advise to all cryptocurrency enthusiasts to first master the stages and dangers( yes Bitcoin can also be dangerous if not traded with caution) it is greatly important to gradually understand the sophisticated security system. There are cases you will need to consult and seek advice from some trusted professional Bitcoin traders. to help you understand the signs  language of Bitcoin. How do you know when is the best time to buy and sale?  Generally the world of cryptocurrency is a complex world just like the University with different departments, faculties, staffs and so on, so enthusiasts should also take time to comprehend common pitfalls that stands in the face of a promising investment.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Ohh what a weird and useless argument dear, Sorry for being softly rude but this is reality let me ask you one thing didn't you think properly before creating this topic, there are 2 Kidnies in the body I don't think, after losing 1 kidney you'll die, and do you really think the digital market there 2 Bitcoins, You should have called it as Stomic, Brain, Hear, Liver anything unique which is existing Solitary. lol, Why I am suggesting haha   , Anyway Bitcoin is BTC don't go too far in the love or I would say dullness. Enjoy with the Kidney haha... I will call it Bitcoin = BTC = BTC

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AM The big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies.Well i believe there are other more important and vital organs of the body that perform more better function than kidney could do since a damaged kidney could be replaced by another or sorrugated by an artificial one, when relating this same idealogy with bitcoin in cryptocurrency, it's more better to say than bitcoin is the head which constitute all the five sense organs and the brainbox of the whole body in which no other organ, cell or system could work without the head, bitcoin is the head of cryptocurrency and that settles it all.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: OP, you obviously have a talent for oratory, and if you delivered your post somewhere on the podium, you would certainly succeed.But here, on the forum, here you are saying obvious things, written hundreds of times. I haven't read anything new except your admiration and idealization of Bitcoin.I don't know; I think that you need to be simpler and easier to relate to everything. Also, review the anatomy. People live well with one kidney until old age and even do business with the second one by selling it.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AM The big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies. Still looking for the weird link.Yes, you can live with a kidney, as you have two kidneys, and there is a possibility to live without them through kidney transplantation and dialysis.It is true that Bitcoin represents most of the real market capacity for cryptocurrencies, but in fact there are no real altcoins models that compete with Bitcoin.It is true that there are more than 26,324[1] cryptocurrencies, but they are all duplicates, hardforks, and tokens, so that cryptocurrencies worth studying are counted on the fingers of the hand, even these cryptos still have multiple shortcomings, and if they succeed in solving them, they may have a market capacity closer to Bitcoin. Forget about that, stablecoins may reach a stage where their market cap is greater than Bitcoin.[1] https://coinmarketcap.com/

comments.author: SeriouslyGiveaway
comments.body: Bitcoin is a heart, brain, liver, hub of cryptocurrency market. It is King and God in this market.The market dominance includes BTC: 48.3% ETH: 19.1% but Bitcoin leads the market.Trading Altcoin Hype Cycles

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AM The big question is can you live without kidney? ~Yes, you can! It is possible to live with only one functioning kidney.https://www.kidney.org/atoz/content/onekidneyBut I do not see the point of your analogy. It is true that Bitcoin is one of the most well-known and widely used cryptocurrencies, but comparing it to a kidney seems a bit far-fetched. You could argue that Bitcoin's role in the cryptocurrency world is comparable to a vital organ in the human body, however, the cryptocurrency space is diverse and constantly evolving. So while Bitcoin will probably always have a special place, that does not mean it is the only crucial element in the cryptocurrency world.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Your topic is just singing praises.Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AM The big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies. There are many organs that people cannot live without, it is not just the kidney. Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AMmany atimes I hear people using Bitcoin volatility nature to excuse themselves for not investing.The volatile character of bitcoins is what is attractive to some people who have decided to invest in it. The thought that they can get rich from the volatile increase in bitcoin price is what has made some people want to understand it better. I am an example, I have the believe that bitcoin is a step to wealth, that is why I joined this forum to learn more about it.

comments.author: Asuspawer09
comments.body: Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AM The big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies. In our world of today where Blockchain technology has created financial freedom lots of digital currencies enthusiasts,  believe Bitcoin investments have the striving potential to produce modern age digital currency millionaires and possibly billionaires. I'm not here to talk about Bitcoin volatility, even life itself is volatile but it's worth holding on so Bitcoin also is worth holding on. Why did I say this;  many atimes I hear people using Bitcoin volatility nature to excuse themselves for not investing.Bitcoin has attracted even world great men and made them believe in blockchain technology. It's not an underlying factor that Bitcoin is a great accumulation of worth. I persive Bitcoin as the emperor, the conquerer and game changer for any jack striving to survive in digital currencies. It's influence cannot be overemphasize, Bitcoin have a multilateral influence in a large number of multi national industries, and could transform a number of sectors globally ranging from agricultural sectors, medicals, logistics sectors are also beneficiaries of Bitcoins, it supply energies to even the  centralized systems. I'm originally from a society where, enthusiasts are optimistic that Bitcoin existence is part of a daily activities. Bitcoin influence makes it a fascinating investment to enthusiasts and also gives promising future for other altcoins. Bitcoin is endowed with tight security technology and has long term store of value. However this is my candid strategical advise to all cryptocurrency enthusiasts to first master the stages and dangers( yes Bitcoin can also be dangerous if not traded with caution) it is greatly important to gradually understand the sophisticated security system. There are cases you will need to consult and seek advice from some trusted professional Bitcoin traders. to help you understand the signs  language of Bitcoin. How do you know when is the best time to buy and sale?  Generally the world of cryptocurrency is a complex world just like the University with different departments, faculties, staffs and so on, so enthusiasts should also take time to comprehend common pitfalls that stands in the face of a promising investment.You could live with one kidney, I don't know your logic seems off to me, if you're just gonna say that it can live without it why not use the heart as an example for sure you can live without a heart  I mean that doesnt really make any sense you have 2 kidneys on your body why compare Bitcoin to a kidney what's the other one Ethereum? Bitcoin is the first cryptocurrency that is created and it plays a big role in the cryptocurrency space for sure, its also the most popular cryptocurrency out there, I mean if we are going to delete Bitcoin these days probably this cryptocurrency could still function I mean other blue chips alternative token are already establish it self, like, for example, we have the Ethereum token, there was a huge gap on Ethereum and Bitcoin not still Ethereum was the closes cryptocurrency to Bitcoin even though it has a different purpose and structure to Bitcoin it still able to reach the market price of thousands of dollars in the market. So I think even if bitcoin was deleted at this moment I think Ethereum could easily take over the spot that bitcoin has.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Yea, this is obviously your perception about Bitcoin, but I believe if any Bitcoiner is asked to write a good comprehensive essay about Bitcoin with the use of some metaphorical words, then some people would say that Bitcoin is the leg of all crypto, while some would say it's the heart, some would say it's the brain, and some would say it's the eye, etc. (name them). In that situation, I would say that Bitcoin is the eye of all cryptocurrency because the eye is like the wind of the human body; where one is blind, they can't see anything, and imagine if Bitcoin fails today. That means all cryptocurrencies will crash because Bitcoin is what is holding the market together with the highest trading volume.I would not go with the kidney, perhaps am not saying you are wrong. The reason is that in the medical field, kidneys can be transplanted through surgery, but if you go blind today, my eye cannot be replaced with yours. So is Bitcoin. If anything happens today to Bitcoin, which Altcoin do you think can take the lead? Is it Ethereum or BNB? I don't think it will work.JMO

comments.author: imamusma
comments.body: Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AM The big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies.It makes more sense that you can't live without a heart, while you can still live without a kidney. Then why the kidneys, not the heart?Some people consider bitcoin to be the king of cryptocurrencies, and some people consider bitcoin to be the father of cryptocurrencies. Regardless of their assumptions and mindset about bitcoin, it is inseparable from the technology it has brought to the financial system. Bitcoin is nice decentralized money to gain more trust than the old traditional financial system, but I wouldn't be too whimsical to make similes.

comments.author: asawale
comments.body: Bitcoin is beyond kidney as far as cryptocurrency is concerned. Bitcoin is the soul of cryptocurrency. That's why all the other coins or tokens follow the Bitcoin price thread.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Bitcoin is a complete human body if you put it this way and other cryptocurrency is like the son and daughters of Bitcoin even though other cryptocurrency have different algorithms (much like the same as the human race like there are other nationality). If you think about it there are americans, filipinos, russians, japanese and more where in cryptocurrency there are different algorithms used like sha-256 and more. Using kidney is not what it should be as a person can live with one kidney and as many people have said Bitcoin is the king of Cryptocurrency and that's it.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: imamusma on July 15, 2023, 09:50:20 PMQuote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AM The big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies.It makes more sense that you can't live without a heart, while you can still live without a kidney. Then why the kidneys, not the heart?It's hard to make an analogy if you don't have enough knowledge about the subject yeah I agree it should be the heart because you can still function without kidneys through dialysis, and this is the first time I stumble comparing Bitcoin to kidneys when the brain and hearts are the most essential part of the body.Anyway, this is all about Bitcoin as the king of Cryptocurrency this is what OP is trying to say and we can all agree.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Unpopular opinion: with the current state of the cryptocurrency markets, the entire industry will strive with or without Bitcoin. Things like Ethereum simply already found it's niche, and Ethereum and Bitcoin are pretty much in different categories despite both being under the blanket of "cryptocurrencies".

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on July 17, 2023, 05:03:31 AMUnpopular opinion: with the current state of the cryptocurrency markets, the entire industry will strive with or without Bitcoin. Things like Ethereum simply already found it's niche, and Ethereum and Bitcoin are pretty much in different categories despite both being under the blanket of "cryptocurrencies".Perhaps unpopular in this forum but no less true. I am sure that some of what we call shitcoins are going to coexist with Bitcoin in the future, and Ethereum has all the look of being one of them. I don't think it's going to be more than a dozen or two, which counting that there are more than 26,000 and growing, plus the upcoming implementation of CBDCs that will compete with an advantage in that market, means that a lot of people are going to lose a lot of money.For me Bitcoin is still the best today and I see no reason for this to change in the near future, we can call it kidney, heart or whatever, but I also believe that the future will be different from how Satoshi imagined it in the white paper: more a store of value than a P2P cash.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AMThe big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies. I would have preferred it if you limit the scope of this topic to cryptocurrency and not the entire digital currency as Bitcoin can't take the place of many digital currencies it met to the point of becoming dependent on it. But for cryptocurrencies, I doubt if any of them would still survive if Bitcoin fails.This is why I would have loved it if your topic of the kidney could be changed to that of the heart since the heart is one and the kidney is two. You can survive with one kidney. This makes the heart more important.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: EarnOnVictor on July 17, 2023, 08:22:23 AMI would have preferred it if you limit the scope of this topic to cryptocurrency and not the entire digital currency as Bitcoin can't take the place of many digital currencies it met to the point of becoming dependent on it. But for cryptocurrencies, I doubt if any of them would still survive if Bitcoin fails.While there would be a crash, with the current state of other major cryptocurrencies like Ethereum, they can definitely withstand a Bitcoin failure. Smart contract platforms has simply found their niche already; with stablecoin transfers alone being a huge use-case.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Your comparison of Bitcoin with human organs is laughable but in other way round it's understandable with some of your instance, bitcoin is a digital currency and it can be use to give analysis of a currency, i comprehend the aspect you are trying to drive at, the illustration of Bitcoin with kidney, humans survive with one kidney, so that particular aspect your under assumption, Bitcoin have a good reputation from the day it was created and that's while other coins is under it's control for increment in the market, so Bitcoin is a brain behind the acceleration of other coins, so base on that you can not convince me with your illustration that can be referred that Bitcoin is a kidney of cryptocurrency while kidney can be at functions with one kidney left, so from my understanding that perspective it's a welcomed development, it will mislead newbies with this conception.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Crptomagma on July 15, 2023, 08:51:04 AM The big question is can you live without kidney? I guess the answer is NO so therefore Bitcoin is the kidney of digital currencies.Heart would've been a better analogy. Every human has two kidneys but just one heart. One kidney can be taken out if it goes very bad and no replacement made of it and the human will survive but that can't be tried with the heart. Anyway, I got your drift there. Quote from: asawale on July 16, 2023, 05:12:41 PMThat's why all the other coins or tokens follow the Bitcoin price thread.It doesn't always happen that way. You will be safe to say most follow it but it becomes a hasty generalization when you say, "all"
